sqlQuery.name: SampleBySampleId
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT distinct s.name as name, '@PROJECT_ID@' as project_id FROM ApidbTuning.SampleAttributes s, ($$sample_id$$) ds WHERE lower(s.name) = lower(ds.name)

sqlQuery.name: SampleByMetadata
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT distinct s.name as name, '@PROJECT_ID@' as project_id FROM ApidbTuning.SampleAttributes s, APIDBTUNING.SAMPLEDOWNSTREAM sds WHERE sds.OUTPUT_PROTOCOL_APP_NODE_ID in ($$samples_filter_metadata$$) and sds.OUTPUT_ISA_TYPE = 'Data' and s.PROTOCOL_APP_NODE_ID = sds.PROTOCOL_APP_NODE_ID
